By sequencing the RNA of the virus to identify potential mutations.

What is the primary function of QSPACE-G: To generate a comprehensive 3D structural representation of an organism's proteome at the quaternary level.
To sequence the genome of various organisms for comparative analysis.
To develop new algorithms for predicting protein folding pathways.
To create a database of all known protein sequences across different species.

Development of new vaccines based on predicted protein structures.
Creation of a universal antiviral drug targeting all coronavirus strains.
